description: This file defines a RecyclerView adapter for displaying notes in an Android application. It manages the creation and binding of view holders for note items and handles note click events.

classes.name: NoteAdapter
classes.description: A RecyclerView adapter for handling and displaying a list of notes, utilizing DiffUtil for efficient updates.

methods.name: NoteAdapter()
methods.description: Constructor that initializes the adapter with a DiffUtil callback.

methods.name: onCreateViewHolder
methods.description: Creates and returns a new NoteViewHolder by inflating the note item layout.

methods.name: onBindViewHolder
methods.description: Binds a note to the provided view holder and sets up a click listener to handle note clicks.

methods.name: setOnNoteClickListener
methods.description: Registers a listener for note click events.
